promptText: (1) An operator must obtain verifiable parental consent before any collection, use, or disclosure of personal information from children, including consent to any material change in the collection, use, or disclosure practices to which the parent has previously consented.
completion: If an operator collects personal information from children, then they must obtain verifiable parental consent.

promptText: (1) An operator must obtain verifiable parental consent before any collection, use, or disclosure of personal information from children, including consent to any material change in the collection, use, or disclosure practices to which the parent has previously consented.
completion: If an operator uses personal information from children, then they must obtain verifiable parental consent.

promptText: (1) An operator must obtain verifiable parental consent before any collection, use, or disclosure of personal information from children, including consent to any material change in the collection, use, or disclosure practices to which the parent has previously consented.
completion: If an operator discloses personal information from children, then they must obtain verifiable parental consent.

promptText: (1) An operator must obtain verifiable parental consent before any collection, use, or disclosure of personal information from children, including consent to any material change in the collection, use, or disclosure practices to which the parent has previously consented.
completion: If an operator makes a material change to their collection, use, or disclosure practices, then they must obtain verifiable parental consent.

promptText: (2) An operator must give the parent the option to consent to the collection and use of the child's personal information without consenting to disclosure of his or her personal information to third parties.
completion: If an operator collects a child's personal information, then the parent must be given the option to consent to the collection and use of the child's personal information.

promptText: (2) An operator must give the parent the option to consent to the collection and use of the child's personal information without consenting to disclosure of his or her personal information to third parties.
completion: If an operator collects a child's personal information, then the parent must be given the option to consent to the disclosure of the child's personal information to third parties.
If a website operator wants to collect personal information from a child, then they must obtain verifiable parental consent.
